typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		COMPANYCODE as string,
		SALESORG as string,
		BILLINGDOC as integer,
		ITEM as short,
		EWAYBILLNO as string,
		EXPORTEXINVNO as string,
		EXPORTEXINVDT as string,
		ACCEXCHANGERATE as double,
		NETVALUE as double,
		DOCCURRENCY as string,
		LOCCURAMT as double,
		GSTIN as string,
		REGION as string,
		REGIONNAME as string,
		REGIONDLVPLANT as string,
		CUSTOMERREFDATE as string,
		GROSSVALUE as double,
		INVOICEDATE as string,
		INVOICETIME as string,
		CHANGEDON as date,
		BUSINESSPLACE as string,
		PLANT as string,
		PLANTDESC as string,
		BILLINGTYPE as string,
		DELDOCNO as integer,
		DELDOCDATE as string,
		ORDERNO as string,
		ORDERQUNATITY as double,
		ORDERCREATEDTIME as string,
		REQUESTEDDELDATE as string,
		ORDERSTATUS as string,
		SALESORDERTYPE as string,
		DISTCHANNEL as string,
		DIVISION as string,
		CUSTOMER as integer,
		CUSTOMERNAME as string,
		CUSTOMERCOUNTRY as string,
		CUSTOMERCOUNTRYDESC as string,
		MATERIALPRICEGRP as string,
		MATERIALPRICEGRPDESC as string,
		MATERIAL as string,
		MATERIALDES as string,
		BRAND as string,
		BRANDNAME as string,
		PRODUCTGROUP as string,
		PRODUCTGRPDESC as string,
		PRODUCTHEIRARCHY as string,
		PRODUCTHEIRARCHYDES as string,
		MATERIALTYPE as string,
		MATERIALGRP1 as string,
		MATERIALGRP1DES as string,
		MATERIALGRP2 as string,
		MATERIALGRP2DES as string,
		MATERIALGRP3 as string,
		MATERIALGRP3DES as string,
		MATERIALGRP4 as string,
		MATERIALGRP4DES as string,
		MATERIALGRP5 as string,
		MATERIALGRP5DES as string,
		PCKMATGRP as string,
		PCKMATGRPDES as string,
		SALESGRP as string,
		SALESGRPDES as string,
		SALESOFC as string,
		SALESOFCDES as string,
		SALESDISTRICT as string,
		SALESDISTRICTNAME as string,
		ORDERPONO as string,
		CITY as string,
		CRCONTROLAREA as short,
		UOM as string,
		BILLOFLANDING as string,
		INVOICECRDATE as string,
		INVOICECRTIME as string,
		INVOICECRUSER as string,
		INVSERVRENDDATE as string,
		ORDERCREATEDDATE as string,
		ORDERCREATEDUSER as string,
		ODERPRICINGDATE as string,
		DELCRDATE as string,
		DELCRNAME as string,
		DELGOODSISSUE as string,
		WHOLESALEID as string,
		RETAILID as integer,
		MEANSOFTRANS as string,
		MEANSOFTRANSDESC as string,
		VEHICLENO as string,
		PLANNEDGI as string,
		SHIPTOPARTY as integer,
		SHIPTOPARTYDESC as string,
		EXCHANGERATE as double,
		ORDERREASON as string,
		SHIPPINGCOUNTRYCODE as string,
		SHIPPINGCOUNTRYDESC as string,
		SHIPPINGCITYCODE as string,
		COUNTYCODE as short,
		COUNTYDESC as string,
		CITYCODE as string,
		CITYDESC as string,
		CUSTOMERGRP as short,
		CUSTOMERGRPDESC as string,
		CUSTPRICINGGRP as string,
		CUSTPRICINGGRPDESC as string,
		REFERENCE as long,
		REFERENCEBILLNO as string,
		BILLEDQTYINSKU as double,
		LEAGALSTATUS as string,
		STATEGSTTAX as double,
		CENTRALGSTTAX as double,
		INTEGRGSTTAX as double,
		GSTVALUEININR as double,
		NETVALUEINCTAXININR as double,
		GSTVALUE as double,
		NETVALUEINCTAX as double,
		TAXCODE as string,
		BATCH as string,
		INCOTERMS as string,
		INCOTERMNAME as string,
		PAYTERMS as string,
		PAYTREMSDES as string,
		USAGEINDICATOR as string,
		PRICELISTTYPE as short,
		PRICELISTNAME as string,
		TAXTYPE as string,
		PRICINGDATE as string,
		LOCATIONCODE as string,
		CUSTOMERCLASS as string,
		DIFFERENCE as double,
		BUSINESSAREA as string,
		PROFITCENTER as string,
		CANCELEDSTATUS as string,
		TAXCOLLECTEDSRC as double,
		SPECIALDISCOUNT as double,
		QUANTITYDISCOUNT as double,
		TRADEDISCOUNT as double,
		BASICPRICE as double,
		BASICPRICEDIF as double,
		MRPPRICE as double,
		IGSTTAX as double,
		FREIGHTDISCOUNT as double,
		FREIGHTHEADER as double,
		FREIGHTDESC as double,
		ADHOCDEALERMARGIN as double,
		DEALERMARGIN as double,
		EARLYPAYREBATE as double,
		CASHDISCOUNTMANUAL as double,
		OTHERS as double,
		EXPORTCOMMISSION as double,
		AIRFREIGHT as double,
		PYQTYDISCOUNT as double,
		PYFREIGHTDISCOUNT as double,
		PYEARLYPAYREBATE as double,
		STATEGSTININR as double,
		INTEGRATEDGSTININR as double,
		CENTRALGSTININR as double,
		STATEGST as double,
		INTEGRATEDGST as double,
		CENTRALGST as double,
		ROUNDOFF as double,
		BASICMATERIAL as string,
		DUEDATE as string,
		PORTCODE as string,
		SHIPPINGBILLNO as string,
		SHIPPINGBILLDT as string,
		FOBVALUE as double,
		DISPATCHID as string,
		DISPATCHDT as string,
		PDCCHEQUENO as string,
		PDCCHEQUEDATE as string,
		PDCCHEQUEVAL as double,
		PDCBANKNAME as string,
		CONTROLCODE as integer,
		EINVIRN as string,
		SHIPPINGCONDITION as short,
		CONTAINERID as string,
		LRNUMBER as string,
		SUB as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(newInvoicecrdate = concat(toString(year((toDate(INVOICECRDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(INVOICECRDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(INVOICECRDATE))) ),
		newOderpricingdate = concat(toString(year((toDate(ODERPRICINGDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(ODERPRICINGDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(ODERPRICINGDATE))) ),
		newInvoicecrtime = INVOICECRTIME,
		newCustomerrefdate = concat(toString(year((toDate(CUSTOMERREFDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(CUSTOMERREFDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(CUSTOMERREFDATE))) ),
		newInvoicedate = concat(toString(year((toDate(INVOICEDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(INVOICEDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(INVOICEDATE))) ),
		newInvoicetime = INVOICETIME,
		newDeldocdate = concat(toString(year((toDate(DELDOCDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(DELDOCDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(DELDOCDATE))) ),
		newOrdercreatedtime = ORDERCREATEDTIME,
		newRequesteddeldate = concat(toString(year((toDate(REQUESTEDDELDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(REQUESTEDDELDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(REQUESTEDDELDATE))) ),
		newInvservrenddate = concat(toString(year((toDate(INVSERVRENDDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(INVSERVRENDDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(INVSERVRENDDATE))) ),
		newOrdercreateddate = concat(toString(year((toDate(ORDERCREATEDDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(ORDERCREATEDDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(ORDERCREATEDDATE))) ),
		newDelcrdate = concat(toString(year((toDate(DELCRDATE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(DELCRDATE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(DELCRDATE))) ),
		newDelgoodsissue = concat(toString(year((toDate(DELGOODSISSUE)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(DELGOODSISSUE))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(DELGOODSISSUE))) ),
		newPlannedgi = concat(toString(year((toDate(PLANNEDGI)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(PLANNEDGI))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(PLANNEDGI))) ),
		newPricingdate = toDate('2020-04-01'),
		newEXPORTEXINVDT = concat(toString(year((toDate(EXPORTEXINVDT)))), '-',toString(month(toDate(EXPORTEXINVDT))), '-', toString(dayOfMonth(toDate(EXPORTEXINVDT))) )) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		COMPANYCODE,
		SALESORG,
		BILLINGDOC,
		ITEM,
		EWAYBILLNO,
		EXPORTEXINVNO,
		EXPORTEXINVDT = newEXPORTEXINVDT,
		ACCEXCHANGERATE,
		NETVALUE,
		DOCCURRENCY,
		LOCCURAMT,
		GSTIN,
		REGION,
		REGIONNAME,
		REGIONDLVPLANT,
		CUSTOMERREFDATE = newCustomerrefdate,
		GROSSVALUE,
		INVOICEDATE = newInvoicedate,
		INVOICETIME = newInvoicetime,
		CHANGEDON,
		BUSINESSPLACE,
		PLANT,
		PLANTDESC,
		BILLINGTYPE,
		DELDOCNO,
		DELDOCDATE = newDeldocdate,
		ORDERNO,
		ORDERQUNATITY,
		ORDERCREATEDTIME = newOrdercreatedtime,
		REQUESTEDDELDATE = newRequesteddeldate,
		ORDERSTATUS,
		SALESORDERTYPE,
		DISTCHANNEL,
		DIVISION,
		CUSTOMER,
		CUSTOMERNAME,
		CUSTOMERCOUNTRY,
		CUSTOMERCOUNTRYDESC,
		MATERIALPRICEGRP,
		MATERIALPRICEGRPDESC,
		MATERIAL,
		MATERIALDES,
		BRAND,
		BRANDNAME,
		PRODUCTGROUP,
		PRODUCTGRPDESC,
		PRODUCTHEIRARCHY,
		PRODUCTHEIRARCHYDES,
		MATERIALTYPE,
		MATERIALGRP1,
		MATERIALGRP1DES,
		MATERIALGRP2,
		MATERIALGRP2DES,
		MATERIALGRP3,
		MATERIALGRP3DES,
		MATERIALGRP4,
		MATERIALGRP4DES,
		MATERIALGRP5,
		MATERIALGRP5DES,
		PCKMATGRP,
		PCKMATGRPDES,
		SALESGRP,
		SALESGRPDES,
		SALESOFC,
		SALESOFCDES,
		SALESDISTRICT,
		SALESDISTRICTNAME,
		ORDERPONO,
		CITY,
		CRCONTROLAREA,
		UOM,
		BILLOFLANDING,
		INVOICECRDATE = newInvoicecrdate,
		INVOICECRTIME = newInvoicecrtime,
		INVOICECRUSER,
		INVSERVRENDDATE = newInvservrenddate,
		ORDERCREATEDDATE = newOrdercreateddate,
		ORDERCREATEDUSER,
		ODERPRICINGDATE = newOderpricingdate,
		DELCRDATE = newDelcrdate,
		DELCRNAME,
		DELGOODSISSUE = newDelgoodsissue,
		WHOLESALEID,
		RETAILID,
		MEANSOFTRANS,
		MEANSOFTRANSDESC,
		VEHICLENO,
		PLANNEDGI = newPlannedgi,
		SHIPTOPARTY,
		SHIPTOPARTYDESC,
		EXCHANGERATE,
		ORDERREASON,
		SHIPPINGCOUNTRYCODE,
		SHIPPINGCOUNTRYDESC,
		SHIPPINGCITYCODE,
		COUNTYCODE,
		COUNTYDESC,
		CITYCODE,
		CITYDESC,
		CUSTOMERGRP,
		CUSTOMERGRPDESC,
		CUSTPRICINGGRP,
		CUSTPRICINGGRPDESC,
		REFERENCE,
		REFERENCEBILLNO,
		BILLEDQTYINSKU,
		LEAGALSTATUS,
		STATEGSTTAX,
		CENTRALGSTTAX,
		INTEGRGSTTAX,
		GSTVALUEININR,
		NETVALUEINCTAXININR,
		GSTVALUE,
		NETVALUEINCTAX,
		TAXCODE,
		BATCH,
		INCOTERMS,
		INCOTERMNAME,
		PAYTERMS,
		PAYTREMSDES,
		USAGEINDICATOR,
		PRICELISTTYPE,
		PRICELISTNAME,
		TAXTYPE,
		PRICINGDATE = newPricingdate,
		LOCATIONCODE,
		CUSTOMERCLASS,
		DIFFERENCE,
		BUSINESSAREA,
		PROFITCENTER,
		CANCELEDSTATUS,
		TAXCOLLECTEDSRC,
		SPECIALDISCOUNT,
		QUANTITYDISCOUNT,
		TRADEDISCOUNT,
		BASICPRICE,
		BASICPRICEDIF,
		MRPPRICE,
		IGSTTAX,
		FREIGHTDISCOUNT,
		FREIGHTHEADER,
		FREIGHTDESC,
		ADHOCDEALERMARGIN,
		DEALERMARGIN,
		EARLYPAYREBATE,
		CASHDISCOUNTMANUAL,
		OTHERS,
		EXPORTCOMMISSION,
		AIRFREIGHT,
		PYQTYDISCOUNT,
		PYFREIGHTDISCOUNT,
		PYEARLYPAYREBATE,
		STATEGSTININR,
		INTEGRATEDGSTININR,
		CENTRALGSTININR,
		STATEGST,
		INTEGRATEDGST,
		CENTRALGST,
		ROUNDOFF,
		BASICMATERIAL,
		DUEDATE,
		PORTCODE,
		SHIPPINGBILLNO,
		SHIPPINGBILLDT,
		FOBVALUE,
		DISPATCHID,
		DISPATCHDT,
		PDCCHEQUENO,
		PDCCHEQUEDATE,
		PDCCHEQUEVAL,
		PDCBANKNAME,
		CONTROLCODE,
		EINVIRN,
		SHIPPINGCONDITION,
		CONTAINERID,
		LRNUMBER,
		SUB
	)) ~> sink1
